Articles.Content:
Destructible buildings. Yay.

On the other hand, it does open up some cool stuff for the future. Maybe we'll be able to have new KSCs or rearrange this one.
oh come on
The important part is that this is just the frame work for a major feature of 0.26.

So these are destructable buildings? Hahahahahahaha

As someone said in the other topic: youtubers will be happy, but that's pretty much where it ends.
That was quick...

So these are destructable buildings? Hahahahahahaha

As someone said in the other topic: youtubers will be happy, but that's pretty much where it ends.

It actually seems like there are a lot of people in that chat that were happy about it. Not all of them are Youtubers, surely.
i wonder what feature this could be laying the foundation for?

So these are destructable buildings? Hahahahahahaha

As someone said in the other topic: youtubers will be happy, but that's pretty much where it ends.

Prediction: "What did you do in KSP today?" thread gets filled with screenshots captioned "I blew up KSC".
Cmon! It was awesome! And he said that it paves the way for more features!
That's gonna be expensive....
Underwhelming? You must be kidding. That was glorious.
I agree very underwhelming feature I will be turning off.
What else could it have been? It was said from the beginning that it would be a minor but fun feature. It definitely looked a lot better than I expected.

Underwhelming? You must be kidding.

No, actually, I had a feeling it was going to be a pretty useless secret feature. Again, it does open up the possibility for some neat things later, like maybe being able to rearrange the place.

Destructible buildings?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!

:O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O :O

Thank you for saying what was the secret feature!

I did was able to see the very beginning but I had to go
Oh man. The fire, smoke and destruction. Oh how Jeb will feast on this!
Am I the only one that really doesn't like this so called feature? I mean I fly safe and have no problem with the game but this really isn't something to get hyped about.

I agree very underwhelming feature I will be turning off.

And that's important to note. If you'd prefer not to play with destructible buildings, it can be turned off.

Am I the only one that really doesn't like this so called feature? I mean I fly safe and have no problem with the game but this really isn't something to get hyped about.

Obviously not, someone else made a thread about it being bad.
If it has an option to be turned on and off, I see no problem. Now every one can be happy.
Awesome ! and beautiful explosions and sounds

Destructible buildings. Yay.

Seconded. I'm a bit underwhelmed too. I thought they were going ahead with actual meaning for kerbals aside from just a randomly generated name (like, Final Frontier, and actual meaning to stats, experience, and possibly skills), and I figured that recruitment might be the small feature this time that leads into something big next time.

Oh well. The upgrading of KSC or whatever in 0.26 will probably be interesting, and some of the points discussed that weren't secrets were actually kinda nice (like the full throttle key).

Am I the only one that really doesn't like this so called feature?

No. Since I started playing, I can't say that I can ever remember running into a building. This seems like the sort of thing that might be fun once, and then pretty useless.

I don't mind it being in the game, but was it seriously worth all the hype and secrecy?
I guess this means uncle Whackjob needs to come back to visit and drop big things in all the places.

I thought it would be underwhelming, because I was fully expecting it. However...those explosions looked pretty darn awesome. And the way the buildings crumble is nicely done. Sure, it will get old fast, but the possibilities for 0.26 features because of this are great. It's a nice feature that didn't need to be added, but it's cool that it was.

My biggest question is, and maybe it's too soon to ask, but will modders be able to tap into this feature? That is, will we be able to mod in our very own buildings into the KSC and destroy them? Perhaps buildings that have mod-specific functions even?
